## Filters.ApplyFiltersButton() function

Runs a vertical search. By default has `position: sticky` styling that anchors it to the bottom of the page.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function ApplyFiltersButton({ className, label }: ApplyFiltersButtonProps): JSX.Element;
```
